subject: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have been using junit for a few months now. I had junit.jar inside ant_home/lib, but now I want to get it out of ant_home/lib and put it under a
messageBody:
Hi all,
I have been using junit for a few months now.
I had junit.jar inside ant_home/lib,
but now I want to get it out of ant_home/lib and put it under a separate
directory..
So, i did this:

<property name="my_ant" location="${env.ANT_HOME}/lib"/>
<path id="junit.path">
<pathelement location="${my_ant}\optional.jar"/>
<fileset dir="${my_ant}">
<include name="*.jar"/>
</fileset>
<fileset dir="${lib-ext-java.dir}">
<include name="*.jar"/>
</fileset>
</path>

<taskdef name="junit"
classname="org.apache.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask">
<classpath refid="junit.path"/>
</taskdef>

lib-ext-java.dir, is where i have junit.jar now

It should have worked and recognised junit, but its isn't..
instead I get the following error

taskdef class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask
cannot be found

Help, somebody..

Sadaf


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
